item.title: 巴西对冲基金重量级人物转而看淡当地利率
item.description: 巴西对冲基金经理对当地资产的悲观情绪加倍，现在正瞄准该国的利率市场下注。【原文：Brazilian hedge fund managers have doubled down on their pessimism with local assets, and are now targeting wagers in the country’s rates market.】

item.title: 高盛的科斯汀敦促遏制股指洗牌
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has a message for benchmark managers who are weighing big reshufflings of their indexes to account for a handful of stocks growing to interstellar size: slow down.】

item.title: 巴西公司力促卢拉在补税问题上达成更好的协议
item.description: 巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）通过解决企业税务纠纷来平衡预算的计划正面临障碍，因为一些巴西大公司坚持要求获得更好的待遇。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s plan to balance the budget by reaching settlements in corporate tax disputes is facing hurdles as some large Brazilian companies hold out for better deals.】

item.title: 艾略特薪酬最高的英国董事在 2023 年获得 2,900 万英镑的收入
item.description: 埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）英国薪酬最高的高管去年获得了近 2,900 万英镑（3,800 万美元）的收入。【原文：Elliott Investment Management’s highest-paid executive in the UK received almost £29 million ($38 million) last year.】

item.title: 默多克的 REA 开始与英国房地产门户网站 Rightmove 商谈收购事宜
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，澳大利亚房地产上市服务提供商 REA Group Ltd. 在确认对英国市值最大的房地产门户网站 Rightmove Plc 感兴趣几天后，已开始与该公司进行初步收购谈判。【原文：Australian real estate listing provider REA Group Ltd. has started preliminary takeover talks with Rightmove Plc, days after confirming its interest in the UK’s biggest property portal by market value, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 桑坦德银行削减波兰分行股份，为增长和回购提供资金
item.description: 桑坦德银行（Banco Santander SA）正在出售其波兰分支桑坦德波兰银行（Santander Bank Polska S.A.）的股份，以重新配置资本。【原文：Banco Santander SA is selling down its stake in its Polish arm Santander Bank Polska S.A as it looks to redeploy capital.】

item.title: SLB 表示，锂技术的突破使大规模工厂更接近现实
item.description: 全球最大的油田服务供应商 SLB 公司表示，它在一个锂项目上取得的成果证明，有朝一日它可以在商业规模上生产这种电池金属，同时减少对环境的影响。【原文：SLB, the world’s biggest oilfield services provider, said it achieved results at a lithium project that prove it can some day produce the battery metal at a commercial scale with less impact on the environment.】

item.title: Grifols 持有者呼吁家族和布鲁克菲尔德公司提供 "合理价格
item.description: Grifols SA 的一些大股东正在向这家西班牙血浆公司施加越来越大的压力，要求它在与收购方布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的谈判中寻求大幅溢价。【原文：Some large Grifols SA shareholders are increasing pressure on the Spanish blood plasma firm to seek a substantial premium in talks with suitor Brookfield Asset Management.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的图劳斯基离开亚洲，转任全球银行业职务
item.description: 根据彭博社看到的一份备忘录，摩根士丹利亚太区投资银行主席迪特尔-图洛夫斯基（Dieter Turowski）将前往美国担任该部门全球副主席和最大科技公司顾问的新职位。【原文：Dieter Turowski, Morgan Stanley’s chairman of investment banking for Asia-Pacific, will move to the US for a new position as global vice chairman of the division and adviser to the biggest technology firms, according to a memo seen by Bloomberg.】

item.title: 惠誉称，州预算在科维德繁荣-萧条之后回归 "正常 "状态
item.description: 多年来，美国各州一直在不确定但最终有利的经济环境中徘徊。但现在，惠誉评级公司表示，科维德时代的波动和强劲增长正在消退，经济正在恢复正常。【原文：For years US states have been navigating uncertain, yet ultimately favorable, economic conditions. But now, Fitch Ratings says that the volatility and strong growth of the Covid era is subsiding in a return to normalcy.】

item.title: 刚果向三大贸易巨头出售 Tenke 铜矿
item.description: Glencore Plc、Mercuria Energy Group 和 Trafigura Group 正在从刚果民主共和国的国有矿业公司购买铜，这也是该公司首次销售来自合资项目的金属。【原文：Glencore Plc, Mercuria Energy Group and Trafigura Group are buying copper from the Democratic Republic of Congo’s state miner, which is marketing metal from joint-venture projects for the first time.】

item.title: 花旗认为一些科技公司仍在权衡今年在美国上市的可能性
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）的一位高级银行家表示，少数几家科技公司正考虑在今年最后三个月内在美国交易所上市，从而刺激了潜在首次公开募股（IPO）的热潮。【原文：A handful of tech companies are considering going public on US exchanges during the last three months of the year, a top Citigroup Inc. banker said, stoking the pipeline of potential IPOs.】

item.title: 摩根大通是为英国贝隆公司处理逾 80 亿欧元债务的银行之一
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，摩根大通、法国巴黎银行和美国银行等银行将为英国汽车玻璃维修和更换公司贝隆（Belron）出售超过 80 亿欧元（88 亿美元）的债务，所得资金将用于偿还到期债务和为股东派息提供资金。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co., BNP Paribas SA and Bank of America Corp. are among banks set to market over €8 billion ($8.8 billion) in debt for UK vehicle glass repair and replacement company Belron, with the proceeds to go toward pushing out debt maturities and funding a shareholder payout, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: EIA 最新预测：美国石油需求将在 2024 年达到顶峰
item.description: 据美国能源信息署（Energy Information Administration）预测，今年美国石油需求增长将趋于平稳，这是市场最新的看跌指标。【原文：US oil demand growth is forecast to plateau this year, in the latest bearish indicator for the market, according to the Energy Information Administration.】

item.title: 投资者出走使 Wamco 关键债券基金规模缩水至 150 亿美元以下
item.description: 投资者的赎回潮使西部资产管理公司（Western Asset Management Co.【原文：A wave of investor redemptions slashed the size of Western Asset Management Co.’s flagship core plus bond fund below $15 billion, a decline of more than one-third so far this year, as clients pull back after a federal investigation of the firm’s veteran trader and co-chief investment officer Ken Leech.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司的海勒认为房地产市场在经历两年的低迷后已经解冻
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）表示，随着经济状况的改善，房地产市场正在反弹。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management said the real estate market is rebounding amid improved economic conditions.】

item.title: 飓风如何按不完美等级分类
item.description: 热带风暴 "弗朗辛 "逼近路易斯安那州海岸线时，有可能发展成一级飓风。这只是 "弗朗辛 "故事的一部分，也只是其威胁的一小部分。该级别是萨菲尔-辛普森飓风风级表的一部分，在大西洋飓风季节经常被引用（虽然很少用其全名）。该风级表只记录风速，而风速只是飓风对人员和财产造成危害的一部分。雨水和风暴潮【原文：As it approached Louisiana’s coastline, Tropical Storm Francine was threatening to grow into a Category 1 hurricane. That only tells part of Francine’s story and measures just a fraction of its threats. The category is part of the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Wind Scale, which is cited routinely (if rarely by its full name) during the Atlantic hurricane season. The scale captures only wind speeds, which are just part of what can make a hurricane dangerous to people and property. Rain and storm surge】

item.title: 投资者警告：若不提高回报率，英国水务资金将面临风险
item.description: 据了解英国政府与部长们私下会晤情况的人士透露，顶级投资者警告英国政府，除非回报更具吸引力，否则他们不太可能向英国濒临崩溃的水务系统注入更多资金。【原文：Top investors warned the UK government that they are unlikely to inject more money into the country’s ailing water system unless returns are made more attractive, according to people with knowledge of a private meeting with ministers.】

item.title: 空中客车公司总裁呼吁欧洲在国防和航天领域进行整合
item.description: 飞机制造商空中客车公司（Airbus SE）的负责人表示，欧洲的国防和航天公司需要进行整合，以便更好地与全球大国竞争。【原文：European defense and space companies need consolidation to better compete with major global powers, the head of planemaker Airbus SE said, echoing longstanding calls to pool resources more effectively.】

item.title: Teva 因诋毁竞争对手将被欧盟罚款
item.description: 梯瓦制药工业有限公司（Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd.）将被欧盟处以反垄断罚金，原因是该公司被指控试图劝说多发性硬化症药物的竞争对手制造商。【原文：Teva Pharmaceutical Industries Ltd. is set to be hit with an antitrust fine from the European Union over allegations it tried to talk down rival makers of a multiple sclerosis drug.】

item.title: 蓝猫头鹰发行债券偿还信用贷款，加入债务大潮
item.description: 蓝猫头鹰资本公司（Blue Owl Capital Inc.【原文：Blue Owl Capital Inc. is tapping the US high-grade bond market on Tuesday, adding to the flood of new issuance seen over the last few days.】

item.title: 德国商业银行首席执行官离职，德国开始出售股份
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）首席执行官不会寻求续约，这使得这家德国贷款机构在政府开始出售其股份的同时，也在寻找接替者。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s chief executive officer won’t seek an extension to his contract, leaving the German lender searching for a replacement at the same time as the government begins to sell its stake.】

item.title: 巴黎奥运会推动经济发展，使政治动荡黯然失色
item.description: 法国银行的一项调查显示，由于巴黎奥运会有助于法国经济暂时摆脱数月来政治不确定性的影响，法国第三季度将录得加速增长。【原文：France will record an acceleration in growth in the third quarter as the Paris Olympics help the economy temporarily shake off the impact of months of political uncertainty, a Bank of France survey showed.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德将为散户投资者提供私募股权投资产品
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）计划推出一款专为富人量身定制的私募股权产品，以进一步拓展零售财富业务。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management plans to launch a private equity product tailored to rich individuals as the firm expands further into retail wealth.】

item.title: 中国将于年底前就毛时代非洲铁路特许权达成协议
item.description: 据负责该铁路线的机构称，一家中国国有企业将在 2024 年底前敲定一项协议，接管一条连接赞比亚铜矿和坦桑尼亚港口的铁路的特许经营权。【原文：A Chinese state-owned company will finalize an agreement to take over the concession of a railway that links Zambia’s copper mines to a Tanzanian port by the end of 2024, according to the agency in charge of the line.】

item.title: Ally 在首席财务官表示消费者压力和业绩不佳后下跌
item.description: Ally Financial Inc. 首席财务官拉斯-哈钦森（Russ Hutchinson）强调其借款人的信用恶化加剧，并表示该汽车贷款公司可能会出现一些业绩不佳的情况，随后该公司股价下跌。【原文：Ally Financial Inc. fell after Chief Financial Officer Russ Hutchinson highlighted intensifying credit deterioration among its borrowers and said the auto-lender may experience some underperformance.】

item.title: 挪威开发商希望在美国海湾地区新建液化天然气出口项目
item.description: 一家新成立的液化天然气开发商最初考虑在苏格兰和印度建设进口终端，现在正将目光转向建设美国墨西哥湾沿岸的出口能力，加入了众多争相向全球供应天然气的项目行列。【原文：An upstart liquefied natural gas developer that first considered constructing import terminals in Scotland and India is now turning its sights to building out export capacity from the US Gulf Coast, joining a slew of projects vying to supply the world.】

item.title: 索尼发布速度更快的全新 PlayStation 5 Pro，售价 700 美元
item.description: 索尼集团公司将于 11 月 7 日发布其广受欢迎的视频游戏机 PlayStation 5 Pro，售价 700 美元。【原文：Sony Group Corp. will release the PlayStation 5 Pro, a new iteration of its popular video-game console, on November 7 for $700.】

item.title: 战神公司首席财务官称亚洲收购可促进公司发展
item.description: Ares Management Corp. 首席财务官 Jarrod Phillips 说，亚洲在市场发展方面比美国落后约 20 年，Ares Management Corp. 看到了在亚洲通过收购实现增长的机会。【原文：Ares Management Corp. sees opportunities to grow through acquisitions in Asia, which is about 20 years behind the US in terms of market development, Chief Financial Officer Jarrod Phillips said.】

item.title: 德雅丹集团称，劳动力紧缩意味着加拿大将无法实现住房目标
item.description: 德雅丹集团（Desjardins Group）的经济学家认为，加拿大促进建筑业发展的计划方向是正确的，但要在 2030 年之前建造数百万套新房，以恢复人们的经济承受能力，将是 "极其困难的"。【原文：Canada’s plan to boost construction goes in the right direction, but it will be “exceedingly difficult” for the country to build the millions of new houses needed to restore affordability by 2030, according to economists at Desjardins Group.】
